definition: Designated land areas within or near settlements that serve specific community functions or activities.

positive_examples: The new park downtown will include playgrounds and walking trails.
They're building condominiums on the old city block near Main Street.
The cemetery on Oak Avenue has beautiful old oak trees throughout.
We reserved a spot at the campground just outside the city limits.
The municipal planning committee approved the new recreational area.
Families gathered at the community space for the summer festival.
negative_examples: The farmer planted corn across his entire agricultural field.
Wild deer roam freely through the untouched forest preserve.
The construction crew cleared the vacant lot for the new shopping center.
Hikers explored the remote wilderness area in the mountains.
The industrial complex spans several acres near the highway.
Ocean waves crashed against the rocky shoreline.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: WildLand, AgriculturalLand, IndustrialLand, WaterFront
